articles.title: Performance Given for Participants of Military Parade Marking Day of Sun
articles.content:
State Merited Chorus Gives Performance for Participants of Military Parade Marking Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus gave a grand congratulatory performance here on Sunday in honor of the participants of the military parade marking the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, appreciated it together with them. 
					
					 Among the audience were Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam and commanding officers of the KPA. 
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as male chorus "The President and General Are Together," mixed chorus and male chorus "Glory to Workers' Party of Korea", male chorus "We Wish Supreme Commander Good Health" and male solo "Soldiers Live Near the General."
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the greatest honor of the service personnel and people of the DPRK dynamically advancing toward the immensely rosy future of the great Paektusan nation, being blessed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, holding them in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche for all ages.
					
					 The audience was mesmerized by the songs praising the exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by leading the unprecedented struggle for defending socialism to one victory after another, always finding themselves on the forefront of the revolution throughout their lives, and thus built a single-mindedly united politico-ideological power, a world military power and nuclear power on this land. 
					
					 The performance reached its climax when the artistes presented male choruses "Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms" and "Revolutionary Armed Forces Uphold Leadership of Marshal Only" representing the faith and will of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army to guarantee with matchless arms the rosy future of Kim Il Sung's Korea which will prosper for all ages, demonstrating the strongest national power with independent nuclear weapons under the invincible leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 When the performance was over, all the performers and participants in the military parade broke into enthusiastic cheers of "hurrah!" 
					
					 He waved back to them and congratulated the artistes on their successful performance.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that all the participants in the military parade would firmly uphold the cause of the sun with the arms of Paektusan by carrying forward the history and tradition of steady victories of the revolutionary cause of Juche which started and advanced with arms, and creditably discharge their noble missions and duties in defending socialism and accomplishing the cause of building a socialist power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Syrian President
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Monday.
					 The message congratulated the president and the friendly government and people of Syria on the 71st anniversary of its independence and.
					
					 It said that the country's independence was a historic event of epoch-making significance in the struggle of the Syrian Arab people to oppose the aggression and yoke of the imperialists and lead an independent life.
					
					 The Syrian government and people are reliably defending the independence and security of the country, resolutely smashing the acts of aggression of all the hostile forces and meeting their challenges under your correct leadership, the message said.
					
					 It condemned the U.S. recent flagrant act of aggression against Syria and reiterated the firm support and solidarity with the just cause of the government and people of Syria.

articles.title: Art Performance "With a Single Heart" Given Here
articles.content:
Art Performance "With a Single Heart" Given Here
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- An art performance "With a Single Heart" was given at the Rungna People's Pleasure Park here on Sunday in celebration of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It was enjoyed by Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak Yong Sik and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairman of a friendly party, vice-premiers of the Cabinet and delegates to the celebrations of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas Koreans' congratulatory groups and delegations, overseas compatriots, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here and their spouses, military attaches of foreign embassies and their spouses and other foreign guests.
					
					 The performance began with prologue chorus and dance "With a Single Heart" reflecting the noble loyalty and will of the Korean army and people to hold Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea and great sage of revolution, in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche for all ages.
					
					 Its numbers included narration and chorus "Our Leader", female duo and female chorus "Song of Mangyongdae", female quartet and chorus and dance "We Sing of Our Country Holding the Leader in High Esteem" and picture-on-sand and jugglery "Pyongyang Is Best".
					
					 The performers sang loudly of the exploits of Kim Il Sung who worked unprecedented miracle in history by defeating the two formidable imperialisms in one generation and had devoted his all to prosperity of the country and happiness of its people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 They well represented the proud history in which the people has developed the country into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, weathering the stern tempest of the revolution under the wise leadership of the President and the Party.
					
					 Fireworks were on display in the sky.
					
					 The performance ended with epilogue "Leader Will Always Be with Us".

articles.title: People's Art Festival Closes
articles.content:
People's Art Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The 5th April Spring People's Art Festival closed with due ceremony at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Monday. It opened here on the occasion of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, and other senior party and state officials and officials concerned.
					
					 There was a prize-awarding ceremony.
					
					 Special prize went to the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and other five itinerant art squad and groups. Group prize was awarded to 18 units, ensemble prize to 19 art pieces and 12 units, creation prize to 42 persons and prize for best acting to 59 persons.
					
					 At the magic festival, top prize, prize and creation prize went to 7 persons.
					
					 Diplomas and cups were awarded together with the prizes.
					
					 A letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the ceremony.
					
					 Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture and chairman of the festival organizing committee, in his closing address expressed belief that all the participants in the festival would make a radical turn in the production of literature and art pieces and mass-based cultural and art activities and a turn in the Juche-based literary and art development through the festival.
					
					 Then a closing performance was given by the units which proved successful at the festival.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Mexican Party Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Mexican Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday had a talk with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico led by National Leader Alberto Anaya Gutierrez which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: DPRK and Mexican Parties Agree on Exchange and Cooperation
articles.content:
DPRK and Mexican Parties Agree on Exchange and Cooperation
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- An agreement on exchange and cooperation between the Workers' Party of Korea and the Workers' Party of Mexico (WPM) was signed here Monday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, and officials of the WPK Central Committee and from the Mexican side were the members of the WPM delegation led by its national leader Alberto Anaya Gutierrez.
					
					 Ri Su Yong and Alberto Anaya Gutierrez signed the agreement.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, had a talk with the congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Day of the Sun led by Chairwoman Choe Un Bok at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Greetings to Zimbabwean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Zimbabwean President
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Robert G. Mugabe, president of the Republic of Zimbabwe, on April 12 on the occasion of the 37th anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries having a long history and tradition would grow stronger, the message wished the Zimbabwean president good health and happiness and the president and the government greater success in their work for the development and prosperity of the country and wellbeing of the people.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for Thailand
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Thailand
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation led by Pak Myong Guk, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, left here for Thailand on Monday to participate in the high-level dialogue on economic cooperation and integration for promoting the sustained development in the Asia-Pacific Region.

articles.title: Official of DPRK Foreign Ministry Meets French TV Editor
articles.content:
Official of DPRK Foreign Ministry Meets French TV Editor
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Son Gyong, director of the European Department 2 of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, met and informed Scott Michel, French TF1 TV foreign news editor, of the DPRK's stand on the situation of the Korean Peninsula.
					 Referring to the current situation that inches close to a war as the U.S. brought a nuclear aircraft carrier task force to the waters off the Korean peninsula while staging the largest-ever joint military exercises involving huge strategic assets, the director clarified the DPRK's principled stand to resolutely stand against the U.S. high-handed practices and thus protect the country's peace and security and global peace and stability by its own efforts.

articles.title: Despicable Nature, Moral Vulgarity of S. Korean Group of Conservatives Indicted
articles.content:
Despicable Nature, Moral Vulgarity of S. Korean Group of Conservatives Indicted
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea released a detailed report Monday to indict traitor Park Geun Hye and the puppet group of conservatives in south Korea for their despicable and sordid nature and moral vulgarity on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of ferry Sewol sinking disaster.
					 The Sewol disaster was a hideous disaster produced by Park and the group of conservatives who had resorted to all sorts of evil doings, the detailed report said, citing facts.
					
					 Utterly shocking was the despicable act of the puppet group after the occurrence of the disaster and so disorderly was its counteraction, it said, adding:
					
					 Even though she was reported about the sinking of the ferry, Park called a hairdresser to Chongwadae as scheduled and was so composed as to have her hair dressed in a back room. Only instruction she gave was to present a video footage covering the sinking so that she could size up the situation.
					
					 When the families of victims were wailing, the puppet group had a "souvenir" photo taken with the list of those missing in the background. They giggled, dining and wining at a restaurant and even recited a poem related to ferry "Sewol", tapping the table with chopsticks.
					
					 The ferry disaster was neither an accidental one nor natural disaster.
					
					 Disclosing the despicable act committed by Park and her group of conservatives to cover up the truth behind the murder, the detailed report said:
					
					 They brandished the bayonet of suppression, making every possible effort to prevent public opinion critical of their immoral and depraved acts from going afloat.
					
					 The puppet group let the paid media report about Park's "visit to scene" and "encouragement to rescue operation" and "consolation to families of those missing", to support her. They even painted an old lady as a family member of victim and took a photo of Park visiting an incense-burning center and "consoling" the lady before releasing it to the public.
					
					 Park made public a "talk to the people" in which she promised a probe into the truth behind the sinking, punishment of those responsible and institution of a special law for the ferry Sewol disaster. But she made such sophistic words that "judgment for state affairs is also necessary even though business clarification is important", thus categorically denying the demand of the different public circle for the enactment of the special law related to the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 As a result, the special law was enacted after the lapse of six months since the disaster. But the nominal law could not properly probe the truth, to say nothing of doing anything for the punishment of those responsible for the disaster.
					
					 What is all the more shocking is that the puppet group set in motion the Association of Love for Park Geun Hye, the Oboi Association and other right-wing conservative gangsters to hold a rally insulting the families of victims demanding the probe into the truth as "traders of dead bodies".
					
					 Even today when she was thrown into a prison after being ousted from Chongwadae, Park is trying to find a way out, flatly denying all the crimes including the Sewol sinking.
					
					 How desperately Park tried to bury into oblivion her acts during the seven hour absence at the time of ferry sinking can be known clearly from the farce she staged by presenting a letter of contradictory answers by putting forward proxy lawyers even when her fate was at a stake following the disclosure of the hideous political scandal.
					
					 The conservative group is hampering the investigation into the truth by making the Ministry of Maritime and Fisheries carry out independent investigation into the Sewol that had been salvaged, while setting aside the Measure Committee for Victims, Missing Persons and Survivals from Sewol, thereby revealing their sinister intention to hamstring the efforts to probe the truth.
					
					 Now the conservative forces are setting afloat the rumor that credit for the salvage of the hull of Sewol goes to them and trumpeting about making public a white paper on it. But it decided not to specify the causes of the accident, sparking off the public denunciation that "half a white paper is not worth doing".
					
					 If thrice-cursed traitor Park and, her accomplice, the group of conservatives are left intact, more disasters like the Sewol will occur, killing south Koreans en masse.
					
					 No matter how desperately Park and her group of conservatives may try, they can never get rid of the responsibility for Sewol, and the matchless murderers behind the hideous disaster can never escape a stern punishment.

articles.title: Consultative Meeting for 5th Int'l Festival in Praise of Great Persons of Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Consultative Meeting for 5th Int'l Festival in Praise of Great Persons of Mt Paektu
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A consultative meeting was held here on Monday to successfully ensure the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu. 
					 Present there were Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairwoman of the Korean preparatory committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, Ri Chang Gun, vice department director of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea who is vice-chairman of the Korean preparatory committee, officials concerned and National Leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, Secretary General of the National Executive Council of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party Mostafa Jamal Haider, General Secretary of the C.C., United Socialist Nationalist Party of Nepal Shankarlal Shrestha and personages from international, regional and various countries' preparatory committees for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, and friendship and solidarity organizations who are visiting the DPRK to mark the Day of the Sun.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk in her congratulatory speech at the meeting expressed thanks to all the participants for their sincere efforts and activities to glorify the 5th International Festival as a grand political event. She hoped that the meeting would contribute to making the festival a splendid and grand international gathering. 
					
					 Dermot Hudson, co-secretary general of the European regional preparatory committee, appealed to all the world progressive political parties and organizations to proactively contribute to glorifying this year as a year in praise of the great persons of Mt Paektu.
					
					 Pak Gyong Il, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and secretary general of the Korean preparatory committee, noted that the work for successful festival is smoothly going on in the DPRK such as the erection of a monument to the great persons of Mt Paektu. He expressed belief that the 5th International Festival would be a grand political event.
					
					 Then, an action program was discussed for the successful holding of the festival.
					
					 A letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the consultative meeting.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Meeting for 5th Int'l Festival in Praise of Great Persons
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Meeting for 5th Int'l Festival in Praise of Great Persons
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un Monday received a letter from the participants in a consultative meeting held to successfully ensure the Fifth International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu.
					 The letter said that Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un, the great leaders of the Korean people, have been deeply revered by all people as the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu for their feats performed on behalf of the era and history.
					
					 The consultative meeting had a depth-going discussion on the matters for ensuring the smooth holding of the international festival to be held this year which marks the 105th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the 75th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il and the 5th anniversary of Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the Korean party and state, it noted, adding:
					
					 The 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu to be held in Pyongyang and the area of Mt Paektu in August will fully display the desire and will of the progressive mankind to exalt the great revolutionary careers and feats of the peerlessly great men for all ages.
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula and its surrounding areas are inching close the brink of a war quite contrary to the will of the Korean people and the peace-loving people of the world due to the hostile forces' steady sanctions and military provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 The letter expressed full support to the measures for self-defense taken by the DPRK to preserve the country's sovereignty and dignity, regional peace and security.
					
					 It stressed that under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, rosy will be the future of the powerful Paektusan nation envied by the progressive mankind and the cause of global independence in the 21st century will victoriously advance.

articles.title: DPRK Trade Cargo Ship Sets Sail
articles.content:
DPRK Trade Cargo Ship Sets Sail
Nampho, April 17 (KCNA) -- The DPRK 5,000-ton trade cargo ship "Jaryok" (self-reliance) set sail.
					Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un set forth a task on making a 5,000-ton cargo ship and named it in person.
					
					 Workers, technicians and officials of the Ryongnam Dockyard built the "Jaryok" on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and thus provided another material and technical foundation for developing the maritime transport of the country.
					
					 Its sailing ceremony took place at the Ryongnam Dockyard on Monday.
					
					 Present there were O Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and of the dockyard and others.
					
					 Kang Jong Gwan, minister of Land and Maritime Transport, made an inaugural address to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The ship left amid the send-off by the participants.

articles.title: Friendship Gathering of Juche Idea Followers
articles.content:
Friendship Gathering of Juche Idea Followers
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A joint friendship gathering with delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations from different countries took place on Monday.
					 Present there were delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations of various countries staying here to mark the Day of the Sun.
					
					 On hand were Vice-Chairman Ri Kil Song and members of the Social Scientists Society of Korea.
					
					 The participants talked about the matter of intensifying the study and dissemination of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and held diverse sports and amusement games, divided into friendship and solidarity teams.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included a delegation of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran led by First Vice-General Secretary Seyed Mehdi Joulaee and a Kyoto delegation of Japan for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung led by Tsutomu Yasui, vice-chairperson of the Japan-DPRK Friendship Kyoto Net for the Promotion of Cultural, Scientific and Civic Exchange.
					
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung and his family members, the visitors looked round mementoes preserved at the old home.
					
					 Meanwhile, the delegation of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran toured the Tower of the Juche Idea and the Party Founding Museum and the Kyoto delegation of Japan the Munsu Water Park, the Natural History Museum, the Central Zoo, etc.

articles.title: IIJI Secretary General Returns
articles.content:
IIJI Secretary General Returns
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI), and his party left here on Monday.

articles.title: Party Delegations of Various Countries Return
articles.content:
Party Delegations of Various Countries Return
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Party of Socialists in the Republic of Moldova led by Grigore Novac, vice-chairman of its National Council, and a delegation of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party led by General Secretary E. Erdenejamyan left here for home on Monday.
					 Also, departing were Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, and Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy, and his party.

articles.title: Fishery Stations Make Good Hauls in DPRK
articles.content:
Fishery Stations Make Good Hauls in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Fishery stations in the west coastal area of the DPRK are making good hauls.
					 According to O Kwang Dok, vice-director of the Ministry of Fisheries, fishery stations have caught a lot of fish from early March.
					
					 Now, a hundred and scores of fishing boats are conducting an intensive fishing campaign in the waters off Monggumpho and around Cho Islet, he said, adding:
					
					 The Unjon Fishery Station, in particular, has made such achievements as catching nearly 100 tons of fish per boat.
					
					 The Kamapho Fishery Station has increased the fish catch by introducing advanced methods.
					
					 Similar successes have been witnessed at other fishery stations, including the Mundok, Nampho, Kwaksan, Jongju and Cholsan fishery stations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flails U.S. Double-dealing Approach towards S. Korea's Ballistic Missile Test-fire
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flails U.S. Double-dealing Approach towards S. Korea's Ballistic Missile Test-fire
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Days ago, the south Korean warmongers test-fired ballistic missile Hyonmu-2 whose firing range is 800km and staged a burlesque of opening it to media.
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Monday terms it a grave military provocation driving the touch-and-go situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 What matters is the U.S. attitude toward the puppet forces' ballistic missile test-fire, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S., which branded the righteous action of the DPRK as injustice and has made desperate efforts to realize its ambition to stifle it, is keeping mum about south Korea's development of ballistic missile. This is the height of unfair double-standards and double-dealing behavior. 
					
					 The U.S. should not take issue with the DPRK over its measures for self-defence any longer. 
					
					 It has neither qualifications nor face to talk about the DPRK's "violation of UN resolutions". The ballistic missile development by south Korea has no problem but the DPRK's bolstering up its capability for self-defence is "a provocation" and "a threat". This brigandish theory and absurd sophism can cut no ice with anyone.
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. and its vassal forces may try to tighten sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK, we will take a series of toughest countermeasures in succession to bolster its nuclear deterrence for self-defence as long as their moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK persist.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. for Deploying Nuclear Carrier in Waters off Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S. for Deploying Nuclear Carrier in Waters off Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun comments on Monday that the U.S. bellicose deployment of Carl Vinson, a nuclear-powered carrier, in the waters off the Korean peninsula, for threatening the DPRK is nothing but a reckless action of aggression to aggravate the tensions in the region.
					 The reckless action is a last-ditch attempt and gambling of those forces who are driven into a tight corner due to their failed hostile police towards the DPRK, says the commentary, adding:
					
					 The people of the DPRK remain unfazed by such threat and blackmail as deploying a nuclear carrier and will never remain a passive onlooker to the reckless acts of armed robbers showing their teeth.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK with the perfect war deterrence capable of reducing to ashes the detestable advanced bases and sortie bases of aggression at one blow are fully ready to counter any type of war, operation and battle desired by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 It is the toughest stand of the army of the DPRK to strike the most horrible terror into the warmongers' minds and make them suffer the most disastrous defeat in their land.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists fire a single shell into the territory of the DPRK where its sovereignty is exercised, its army will make a merciless just nuclear strike at them at once.

articles.title: Koreans in China Praise Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Koreans in China Praise Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in China on a visit to the homeland to mark the Day of the Sun, had an interview with KCNA on Sunday.
					 Saying they regard it their high honor to take part in the celebrations of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, she added:
					
					 The human history has recorded many great persons and their merits on its pages.
					
					 But, such a man can be hardly found in the world as our Generalissimo great in leadership ability, personality and merit for the country, the nation, the era and history.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, the eternal sun of the nation, built a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, a genuine people's paradise where the song "We Are the Happiest in the World" echoes, in Korea which was once eclipsed in the world map and pervaded with only "Arirang" of sorrow, symbolic of the small and weak colonial nation.
					
					 Indeed, he is the greatest man and sage as he performed titanic exploits for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence with his rare wisdom and seasoned political ability.
					
					 All members of the Association's congratulatory group keenly felt the privilege and great fortune of being blessed with the illustrious leaders through the military parade and public procession of Pyongyang citizens celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Marked in Int'l Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Marked in Int'l Body
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- An event for laying a floral basket before a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung took place at the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America on April 12 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 Present at the event were the general secretary and members of the organization, the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung and paid tribute to him.
					
					 The general secretary of the organization said it high honor of them to lay a floral basket and pay tribute to the President on the occasion of his 105th birth anniversary.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung had devoted his all to the liberation and happiness of the people all his life and always firmly preserved the revolutionary principle in the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle.
					
					 After the foundation of the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America he had paid deep attention to its work.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Swiss bodies and a Myanmar personage issued statements on April 1 and 6 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Swiss Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the 105th Birth Anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said in their joint statement:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung is the most prominent great leader and statesman in human history.
					
					 He liberated Korea from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule, defeated the U.S. imperialists in the Fatherland Liberation War and turned socialist Korea into a paradise for people.
					
					 He had energetically worked to realize the national reunification till the last moments of his life.
					
					 That's why the Korean people have grandly celebrated his birth anniversary as the Day of the Sun, holding him in high esteem as the sun of the nation.
					
					 The President, who dedicated all his life to the happiness of the people, clearly showed the road ahead of the cause of global independence.
					
					 He is a great internationalist as he rendered material and moral support to the peoples in Asia, Africa and Latin America struggling for national liberation.
					
					 Maung Maung Naying, director general of the Myit Tar Moe Publishing House of Myanmar, praised the President as the peerless elder statesman and the greatest man who led the Korean revolution to victory under the banner of independence and steered the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Released in Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Released in Cambodia
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Usher in a New Golden Age in Building a Sports Power in the Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu" was published in pamphlet by the Angkor Thom Publishing House of Cambodia on April 5 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work, published on March 25, Juche 104 (2015), refers to the fact that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il showed the way for developing the Juche-oriented physical culture and sports with their outstanding idea and leadership and opened a new history of building the sports power.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways for building the sports powerhouse.

articles.title: Coro Estatal Benemerito Ofrece funcion por los participantes en el desfile militar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 17 un mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad, Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					En ocasion del 71o aniversario de la independencia de Siria, extiendo las calurosas felicitaciones y el saludo combativo a Vd. y al gobierno y pueblo amistosos de vuestro pais.
					
					La independencia de vuestro pais fue un evento historico que tiene la significacion trascendental en la lucha del pueblo arabe sirio por oponerse a la agresion y la subyugacion de los imperialistas y explorar la vida independiente.
					
					Hoy tambien, bajo su direccion correcta, el gobierno y pueblo de vuestro pais defienden confiablemente la independencia y la seguridad del pais frustrando tajantemente la agresion y desafio de las fuerzas hostiles de toda indole.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para condenar la flagrante agresion de EE.UU. recien cometida contra vuestro pais y reafirmar el apoyo y solidaridad firmes con la causa justa del gobierno y pueblo de la Republica Arabe de Siria.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion artistica por el 105o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Il Sung 
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en el Area de Recreo del Pueblo de Rungna la funcion artistica "Una sola voluntad" en celebracion del 105o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					Presenciaron la funcion Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak Yong Sik y otros cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los vicepremieres y los delegados a las festividades del Dia del Sol.
					
					Fueron invitados los grupos de felicitacion y delegaciones de compatriotas residentes en ultramar, los compatriotas de visita en la patria, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los matrimonios de representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los de agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					La funcion se inicio con el preludio del coro y danza "Una sola voluntad" que refleja la decision de todos los militares y civiles coreanos de enaltecer generacion tras generacion como eterno Sol del Juche al Presidente Kim Il Sung, fundador de la Corea socialista.
					
					En la escena de la funcion se presentaron la narracion y coro "Nuestro Lider", el duo y coro femeninos "Cancion de Mangyongdae", etc. 
					
					Los ejecutantes alabaron las proezas del Presidente quien creo el milagro nunca visto en la historia venciendo en una generacion a los dos imperialismos poderosos e hizo todo lo posible hasta el ultimo momento de su vida por la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo. 
					
					Describieron la orgullosa historia de la RPDC que se ha convertido en la potencia socialista basada en la independencia politica, la autarquia economica y la autodefensa nacional superando las severas pruebas de la revolucion bajo la sabia orientacion del Presidente y el Partido. 
					
					Se tiraron las salvas. 
					
					La funcion termino con el epilogo "El Lider vive siempre con nosotros".

articles.title: Efectuada reunion consultiva para exito de festival de elogio a grandes hombres
articles.content:
Efectuada reunion consultiva para exito de festival de elogio a grandes hombres 
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en esta capital la reunion consultiva para la celebracion exitosa del 5o Festival Internacional de Homenaje a los Grandes Hombres del Monte Paektu.
					En la ocasion tomaron parte Kim Jong Suk, presidenta del comite preparatorio coreano para el congreso de elogio a grandes hombres del monte Paektu de 2017 y  del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Chang Do, vicepresidente del comite preparatorio arriba mencionado y subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, y otros funcionarios interesados.
					
					Y estuvieron presentes el secretario general del Consejo Ejecutivo Nacional del Partido Jatiya de Bangladesh, Mostafa Jamal Haider, el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Socialista Nacional Unido de Nepal, Shankarlal Shrestha, y las personalidades del comite preparatorio internacional, los preparatorios regionales y de varios paises, para el congreso de elogio a grandes hombres del monte Paektu de 2017, asi como las personalidades de las organizaciones de estudio de la Idea Juche y otras entidades de amistad y solidaridad, quienes estan de visita en la RPDC por el Dia del Sol.
					
					En su palabra de felicitacion, Kim Jong Suk expreso agradecimiento a todos los participantes quienes hacen esfuerzos sinceros y dinamizan sus actividades para celebrar el conclave como el gran festival politico. 
					
					Y deseo que la presente reunion haga aporte a la celebracion solemne del festival como el gran evento internacional. 
					
					Seguidamente, hubo intervenciones. 
					
					Dermot Hudson, co-secretario general del comite preparatorio de la region europea, llamo a todos los partidos politicos y entidades progresistas del mundo a dinamizar mas sus actividades para contribuir a hacer el presente de un ano de elogio a grandes hombres del monte Paektu. 
					
					Pak Kyong Il, secretario general del Comite Preparatorio Coreano, se refirio a que se impulsan exitosamente en la RPDC los trabajos para la marcha exitosa del festival, entre otros la construccion del monumento de elogio a grandes hombres del monte Paektu. 
					
					Manifesto su conviccion de que el 5o festival se celebrara como una gran festividad politica. 
					
					Se discutio detalladamente el rumbo de las actividades necesarias para la exitosa apertura del festival. 
					
					Por ultimo, quedo aprobada una carta dirigida al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH publica informacion sobre tragedia de "Sewol"
articles.content:
Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH publica informacion sobre tragedia de "Sewol"
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 3o aniversario de la tragedia del ferry "Sewol", la Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea publico el dia 17 una informacion detallada para revelar la bajeza moral de la traidora Park Geun-hye y sus complices conservadores del Sur de Corea. 
					El hundimiento del ferry "Sewol" fue causado por la traidora Park y la banda conservadora surcoreana que se dedicaban a las maldades de todo tipo, adelanta la nota y continua:
					
					Fue muy chapucera la reaccion de las autoridades surcoreanas al incidente del ferry.
					
					A sabiendas del accidente, Park Geun-hye no altero la hora reservada para traer a una peluquera a Chongwadae y se limito a dar la orden de enviarle un video sobre el hundimiento. 
					
					Cuando los familiares de victimas derramaban lagrimas de tristeza, los compinches conservadores de ella cometieron actos repugnantes como tomar "foto de recuerdo" teniendo en el trasfondo la lista de desaparecidos y organizar orgias en los restaurantes. 
					
					Como se ve, la tragedia del ferry "Sewol" no fue un accidente casual ni desastre natural.
					
					Park Geun-hye y sus complices actuaron con bajeza para ocultar la verdad de sus actos criminales. 
					
					Intensificaron la represion fascista haciendo todo lo posible para evitar la expansion de la opinion publica critica a sus actos corruptos. 
					
					Los medios de prensa venales, instigados por los titeres surcoreanos, defendieron a Park informando que ella "visita al lugar del incidente", "estimula las actividades de socorro" y "expresa condolencias a los familiares de desaparecidos" y orquestaron hasta una farsa de que en un altar de incensacion, Park "da consuelo" a una anciana disfrazada de familiar de victima. 
					
					La traidora publico una "declaracion al pueblo" prometiendo esclarecer la verdad de la tragedia, castigar a los culpables e instituir la ley especial sobre el "ferry Sewol", pero de hecho, desprecio la demanda de los habitantes de diferentes sectores sobre la institucion de esa ley especial con el sofisma de que "es importante el esclarecimiento practico, pero hace falta tambien el juicio politico". 
					
					De esta manera, 6 meses despues del incidente, quedo instituida a duras penas la ley especial que no estipula el castigo a los culpables ni permite esclarecer la verdad. 
					
					Lo mas intolerable es que los titeres surcoreanos lanzaron a los gangsteres conservadores y derechistas como "Oboi Yonhap" a organizar un mitin para ofender como "traficantes de cadaveres" a los familiares de victimas que demandaban el esclarecimiento de la verdad de lo ocurrido. 
					
					Park, expulsada de Chongwadae y encarcelada ahora, busca todavia la salida negando todos sus crimenes, incluso la tragedia del ferry "Sewol". 
					
					Para dejar en el secreto su comportamiento en 7 horas de la tragedia, presento hasta en el momento de juicio a si misma la respuesta escrita de contenido contradictorio, por conducto del panel de abogados. 
					
					Los conservadores surcoreanos mostraron su mala intencion de obstaculizar la investigacion de la verdad del caso al autorizar al Ministerio de Pesca Maritima abrir a solas la investigacion en el terreno sobre el ferry sacado a flote, excluyendo el comite de medidas de familiares de muertos, desaparecidos y sobrevivientes. 
					
					Ahora los conservadores surcoreanos difunden el rumor de que el saque a flore del casco del barco es el merito de si mismos e insisten en publicar una carta blanca sobre el respecto sin aclarar la causa del accidente, lo cual provoca una avalancha de criticas tales como "es inutil esa carta blanca a medias". 
					
					Mientras existan Park y sus seguidores conservadores, no se dejara de repetir la tragedia del "Sewol". 
					
					Park y sus compinches seran sometidos al castigo severo sin poder eludir la responsabilidad del accidente de gran dimension.
